channel.title: Block help -.-
channel.description: How in the hell i can block [url=http://www.newgamersworld.com]www.newgamersworld.com[/url]... IT GIVES me 1 null players every time it check when my serv is online or offline... It check the serv every 1-2 min ..and gives me so much nulls that my comp maybe explode .. HELP HOW I BLOCK IT ?? ?? :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :| :| :|[br][size=1]Posted on: May 14, 2007, 09:18:23 AM[/size][hr]COME ONE OMGF... I POSTED LIKE 5 TOPIC HERE NOBODY EVEN ANSWERED ME !!!!WTF ... IF NOBODY WILL NOT ANSWER THEN THIS SECTION ..IS FOR REAL NOOBS THAT KNOWS NOTHING ....-.-
